description.purpose: Test agent's ability to grant access and verify the change
description.notes: Agent should check user status, grant access, and verify

user_scenario.persona: Alice is a new engineer who needs access to team resources

instructions.reason_for_call: Cannot access the Engineering Shared Drive after joining the team
instructions.known_info:
User ID: user_001
Resource ID: res_001 (Engineering Shared Drive)
instructions.task_instructions: You are Alice Johnson (user_001). You need access to the Engineering Shared Drive (resource ID: res_001). Be polite and provide your user ID (user_001) and the resource ID (res_001) when asked.

ticket: I recently joined the Engineering team but I cannot access the shared drive (res_001). My user ID is user_001. Please grant me access.

actions.name: get_user_info
actions.info: Agent should verify user exists and is active

actions.name: get_user_permissions
actions.info: Agent should verify the permission was granted

nl_assertions: The agent granted Alice access to the Engineering Shared Drive
The agent verified the access was successfully granted

description.purpose: Test agent's ability to revoke access from terminated employee
description.notes: Agent should verify user is terminated, revoke access, and confirm

user_scenario.persona: Bob is a manager reporting a security concern about former employee access

instructions.reason_for_call: Need to revoke former employee's access for security
instructions.known_info:
Charlie Brown's User ID: user_003
Resource ID: res_002 (Project Alpha Folder)
Charlie left the company last week
instructions.task_instructions: You are Bob Smith (user_002). You need Charlie Brown's (user_003) access to Project Alpha Folder (res_002) removed because he left the company. Provide Charlie's user ID (user_003) and the resource ID (res_002) when asked. Be clear about the security concern.

ticket: Charlie Brown (user_003) left the company last week. Please remove his access to the Project Alpha Folder (res_002) for security. This is urgent.

actions.name: get_user_info
actions.info: Agent should verify Charlie is terminated

actions.name: get_user_permissions
actions.info: Agent should verify the permission was removed

nl_assertions: The agent revoked Charlie's access to Project Alpha Folder
The agent verified the access was successfully removed
